It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 41 #ifdef PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC 42 43 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 44 template<typename Pred> 45 void 46 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 47 split(Pred pred, PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC& other) 48 { 49 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID((*this)) 50 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID(other) 51 52 make_binomial_heap(); 53 other.make_binomial_heap(); 54 base_type::split(pred, other); 55 base_type::find_max(); 56 other.find_max(); 57 58 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID((*this)) 59 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID(other) 60 } 61 62 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 63 inline void 64 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 65 join(PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC& other) 66 { 67 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID((*this)) 68 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID(other) 69 70 make_binomial_heap(); 71 other.make_binomial_heap(); 72 base_type::join(other); 73 base_type::find_max(); 74 other.find_max(); 75 76 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID((*this)) 77 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID(other) 78 } 79 80 #endif
